item.title: Nullcon 2025
item.description:
TL;DR: Web had template-injection vibes, Forensics was timeline/log carving, Crypto relied on a weak construction. Notes below are concise; expand as you publish.

Approach

User input reflected inside a template block; error page referenced jinja2.exceptions â†’ Jinja2 confirmed. WAF blocked exact {{ }} but allowed variants (whitespace/newlines).
